H0.text: By burrowing under the soil, the earthworm responded to being placed on a thick layer of moist topsoil in a pan that was in a room with the lights on.

H1.text: By crawling around in the pan, the earthworm most likely responded to being placed on a thick layer of moist topsoil in a pan that was positioned in a room with the lights on.

H2.text: Staying where it was placed is the most likely response of the earthworm that was positioned on top of a thick layer of moist topsoil in a pan in a room with the lights on.

H3.text: By trying to crawl out of the pan, the earthworm most likely responded to being placed on top of a thick layer of moist topsoil in a pan that was positioned in a room with lights on.
